title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.35 - Qualifications of person calling game
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.35 - Qualifications of person calling game

State Regulations

No person shall act as a caller or assistant to the
caller in the conduct of any game of bingo unless such person has been a member
in good standing of the licensee conducting such game or one of such licensee's
registered auxiliaries for at least one year immediately prior to the date of
such game, be of good moral character and never been convicted of a
crime. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
